About the Company: Ashok Leyland has been a major presence in India`s commercial vehicle industry.The company offers a wide range of products like buses , trucks ,engines , defence & special vehicles. In the populous Indian metros, four out of the five State Transport Undertaking (STU) buses come from Ashok Leyland. Some of them like the double-decker and vestibule buses are unique models from Ashok Leyland, tailor-made for high-density routes.
